checkout.scheduled_delivery_with_in_home_setup_de: Our delivery partner will be in touch to schedule your deliveries once order has been placed. You can only schedule deliveries for orders placed at least 3 business days before your preferred delivery date.
checkout.scheduled_delivery_with_in_home_setup_fa: In-home setup only includes setting up of large items purchased (mattress or bed frame). Scheduled delivery with in-home setup cannot be refunded in the event of a return.

If you are getting a mattress or bed frame delivered with our scheduled delivery with in-home setup option, our delivery partner will remove your old mattress and bed frame from the same room and at the same time of the delivery. Removals cannot be refunded/returned.
checkout.shipping_address_review: Please review the shipping address before placing your order.

popup.message: You haven't finished checking out yet!

shipping_method.standart_delivery_no_contact: Contactless Delivery. Ships out in 1 business day and arrives within 3 to 5 days.
shipping_method.schedule_delivery_incomplete: Scheduled delivery with in-home set up is incomplete.
shipping_method.subtitle: In order to get your items delivered to you faster, your order may be split into two or more shipments.
